message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact on your operations, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12500. This represents an exceptional opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a discount compared to its market value of $15000. Please let me know if this offer suits your needs and budget, so we can proceed with the transaction.
